report.title: EU Pollinator Fixed Square Results For Samples
report.description: List of samples for the fixed square survey (also supports My Own Data Only, and Regional Coodinator functionality).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN locations square on square.id = csf.location_id AND square.location_type_id = #1km_square_location_type_id# AND square.deleted = false JOIN location_attribute_values country_code_attr_val on country_code_attr_val.location_id = square.id AND country_code_attr_val.location_attribute_id = #country_code_loc_attr_id# AND country_code_attr_val.deleted = false JOIN locations country on country.code = country_code_attr_val.text_value AND country.location_type_id = #country_location_type_id# AND country.deleted = false #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND csf.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date)))

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: survey_id
param.description: ID of the pan trap count survey.

param.name: country_id
param.description: Setup page config with country_id={profile_indicia_coordinate_country}.

param.name: country_code_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that holds the country code for an 1km location.

param.name: 1km_square_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for 1km Squares.

param.name: country_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for countries.

param.name: pan_trap_moved_attr_id
param.display: Pan Trap Moved sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Pan Trap Moved question.

param.name: pan_trap_station_attr_id
param.display: Pan Trap Station sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Pan Trap Station question.

param.name: pan_trap_active_from_attr_id
param.display: Pan Trap Active From sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Pan Trap Active From question.

param.name: pan_trap_active_to_attr_id
param.display: Pan Trap Active To sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Pan Trap Active To question.

param.name: pan_trap_disturbed_attr_id
param.display: Pan Trap Disturbed sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Pan Trap Disturbed question.

param.name: temperature_at_start_attr_id
param.display: Temperature At Start sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Temperature At Start question.

param.name: wind_speed_at_start_attr_id
param.display: Wind Speed At Start sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Wind Speed At Start question.

param.name: cloud_cover_at_start_attr_id
param.display: Cloud Cover At Start sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Cloud Cover At Start question.

param.name: temperature_at_end_attr_id
param.display: Temperature At End sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Temperature At End question.

param.name: wind_speed_at_end_attr_id
param.display: Wind Speed At End sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Wind Speed At End question.

param.name: cloud_cover_at_end_attr_id
param.display: Cloud Cover At End sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Cloud Cover At End question.

param.name: sun_exposure_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Sun Exposure question.

param.name: vegetation_height_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Vegetation Height question.

param.name: primary_habitat_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Primary Habitat question.

param.name: secondary_habitat_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the answer to the Secondary Habitat question.

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of sample IDs to filter to.
